text: Ion Adrian Zare (11 May 1959 â€“ 23 February 2022) was a Romanian footballer. He played as a defender. Zare was born in Oradea, Romania. He played for the national team from 1984 until 1987, making seven appearances. Zare died on 23 February 2022 in Oradea at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Romanian football managers Category:Romanian footballers Category:Romania at UEFA Euro 1984
title: Ion Adrian Zare
